summary: American Courtesans is a feature documentary that takes you into the lives of American sex workers.
cast: Norma Jean Almodovar|Stephen Ardain|Karen M. Barnes|Pearl Callahan|Gary Callais|Allan Campo|Juliet Capulet|Tamsen Crown|Skylar Cruz|Tiffany M. DeLaRaga|Gina DePalma|Kristen DiAngelo|Emma DuPree|Helen Ewing|Jimmie Hildreth|Hilary Holiday|Michal Mainwaring|Erin Marxx|Sara Munoz Perry|Pierre|Bobby R. Poirier|Jacob Polstra|Gina Robinson|Matt S.|Eric Tyler
title: American Courtesans
